Text: is anything ripped or the video/audio recoded to a lower bitrate?
In diz pack which one is left for this game

notforlonger:

"Any lossy compressed game ,generally packed in an installer that has been released by the scene (pirate groups). The main aim is to reduce size with not much loss of quality.
the followings are generally compressed (lossy/lossless)
textures
sound
videos
Multi language support is stripped to reduce size
similar to full rips but with installers, as with ripped games installation takes more time due to decompression/unpacking."
so nothing is reduced? just that they are compressed to smaller size? but everything will be as normal once it is installed?

As far as I'm aware yes - I didn't create the pack, though - this comes straight from the source minus the archive packaging over at wbb. I installed it a couple days ago once I finished the download, and I haven't noticed anything missing.

Actually, here's a link to the packing group - they're fairly well known on wbb and have their own FAQ for the games they do.

*Tried to post the link, got a 'database error' issue - guess the system thinks it's spam. Search for this thread over at w-bb: "Custom Repacks - By Black_Box Team- Duke Nukem Forever [ GB]"
